about_the_game:
Click on the image below to join discord!

🌌 Face the invasion of the Void and march forward bravely. In this unknown world, the invasion of Void creatures has brought an unprecedented crisis. As the last line of defense for humanity, you are the guardian of light, and you must bravely resist this force of darkness!
________________________________________

🛠️ Build an invincible lineup, showcase strategic wisdom. Combine with the bonds of other races and leverage the strengths and abilities of your pieces. Thoughtfully design your tactics, as each deployment may alter the course of battle, determining the balance between victory and defeat.

________________________________________

🔥 Dive into a deep Roguelike experience, face ever-escalating challenges. Each battle brings new trials and opportunities. Choose from three technology enhancements, adapt to the ever-changing battlefield, and demonstrate your tactical depth and adaptability.

________________________________________

🎭 The fate of humanity is in your hands. In this life-and-death struggle, you are not only a commander but also a decision-maker. Choose the right strategies, cooperate closely with allies, and collectively resist the invasion of the Void, securing the last living space for humanity!

________________________________________

🌠 The outlook for the future holds infinite possibilities. "LastDitch" is a continually evolving world. With the passage of time, new races, pieces, bonds, technologies, and game modes will constantly be introduced, providing you with a more enriched and immersive gaming experience.

________________________________________

⚔️ Join "LastDitch" now and become the guardian of this strategic world, resisting the invasion of the Void, and writing the final legend of humanity!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 或 Intel Core i5-10400
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Super 或 AMD Radeon RX 5500 XT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space

short_description: "LastDitch" combines 2D tower defense and auto-chess, immersing players in a futuristic clash against void creatures. Strategically choose pieces barricades for defense, barracks for minions, fortresses for high damage. Experience intense battles, unique pixel art style, profound strategic depth.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
